short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shows Sellers Rank and display large image on hover on Amazon's website

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shows Sellers Rank and display large image on hover on Amazon's website. Just rollover on item to see bigger image. Attention: only works well with Merch by Amazon items.
